articles.title: Get Your Data Out of OneNote (Without Fighting Microsoft's Export Tools)
articles.description: Extract OneNote notebooks to markdown in minutes with just a view-only link. No API setup, no OAuth, no fighting with export buttons.

articles.title: Sheetmask released!
articles.description: Sheetmask anonymizes your data and keeps relationships intact. It is great for PnLs and other financial data where the structure matters.
